name: Panda Choice Mahjong
description:
The panda has made her choice! Follow her into the wonderful world of the most ancient game.

The game contains 120 mahjong game layouts. This is a real test for your abilities! Both simple and classic levels and unusual thematic ones are waiting for you. The game has 6 game locations, each of which has a lot of interesting levels. Multilayer puzzles and huge layouts of 200 chips. Relax and dissolve in mahjong!

- Collect gold chips to pass the levels and open the next location
- Capture bonus chips and get extra coins and bonuses
- multiplier combos for more coins
- 6 locations
- 120 levels
- 2 game difficulty modes
